name: Cool Dentist Office Free
description:
Many stars are sick because of greediness. Now they come to your clinic to ask for help.

You, a senior dentist, have to treat them with your professional and skillful ways.
Different people have different tooth problems. You must make correct judgment and use proper tools.
Collect coins during treating to upgrade tools to solve problems quickly.
More surprising roles are waiting for you to unlock!
Download it now and start your treatment!
★Features★
★★

★★★ Various funny roles
★★★★★ Exquisite graphics
★★★★★ Many special treatments
★★★★★ Gorgeous scenes and levels
